Aries: 7th House in Aries — You attract bold lovers. Passion = priority.
Taurus: 7th House in Taurus — Loyal lovers. Love grows slowly but surely.
Gemini: 7th House in Gemini — Flirty, witty partners. You need convo chemistry.
Cancer: 7th House in Cancer — You marry into emotion. You crave safe love.
Leo: 7th House in Leo — Big love, grand gestures. Dramatic but loyal.
Virgo: 7th House in Virgo — Devoted partners. You love through help and fixing.
Libra: 7th House in Libra — Classic romance. You attract Venusian vibes.
Scorpio: 7th House in Scorpio — Deep, powerful love. Obsessive loyalty.
Sagittarius: 7th House in Sagittarius — You fall for adventurers. Soulmate on a journey.
Capricorn: 7th House in Capricorn — You seek structure. Partners = life plans.
Aquarius: 7th House in Aquarius — You love eccentrics. Weird = hot.
Pisces: 7th House in Pisces — You crave soul-deep love. Love = poetry.
